title: Is wearable technology expected to grow in future? What all wearable devices are there in the market today? - Quora

response.answer_text: Currently the wearable market has not really settled. There are smart-watches and other wearable tech, but I would advise you to not buy a wearable gadget right now, unless you’ve got loads of extra money to spend, because they are not worth the cash. Let the wearable tech market grow, probably another 2–3 years. Cheers.
